Test Scenario Description: Verify that user is able to view all the fields
Verify that bottons and form fields are accessible or not.
Verify that required fields contains asterisk (*) or not.
Verify that error message are displayed for required fields when left blank.
Verify that proper error message is displayed when invalid information is entered.
Verify that proper success message is displayed when membership is created with valid information.
Verify that fields are aligned properly across different resolutions and devices.
Verify that form labels are visible and clear.
Verify that responsiveness of the "Apply Membership" page on diiferent devices(mobile,tablet,desktop).
Verify that all the fields of add user is available.
Verify that all the required fields contains asterik (*).
Proper validation messages should be displayed if the user enters an incorrect value in any of the form fields.
Verify that Save button is enabled after all mandatory/required fields are entered.
Verify that error message should prompt invalid user.
Verify that the system prevents adding dupicate user with the same name
Verify that system handles both the maximum and minimum character lengths for the user.
Verify that select roles can be selected using checkboxes.
Verify that user field can be left  but select the roles field.
Verify that the selected roles for the new user  are saved automatically.
Verify that the form can be submitted successfully when all required fields are filled correctly.
Verify that the newly add  user is displayed in the user role management.
Verify that a success message is displayed after adding a user.
Verify that error message should be displayed when required fields are left empty.
Verify that error message can appear when invalid data is entered.
Verify that error message are displayed for  each field left blank when attempting to submit the form.
Verify that the Edit Role form can be accessed successfully.
Verify that close button is clickable or not .
Verify that edit icon is clickable
Verify that after editing the changes are correct
Verify that the user can be updated in the user field.
Verify that select role can be modified by selecting or deselecting checkboxes.
Verify that the form validates input and prevents submission if required fields are left empty.
Verify that user can be updated  without any duplication.
Verify that form cannot be submitted if required field is left empty.
Verify that error message is shown if the user exceeds the maximum character .
Verify that error message is shown if the user name have  maximum character .
Verify that the form cannot be submitted if select roles are not selected.
Verify that the updated select roles are saved correctly after editing the role .
Verify that changes are reflected immediately in the system without needing to refresh the page.
Verify that success message is displayed after the user has been successfully edited.
Verify that updated user can be mention in the top in the user role management.
